pr_title: #2431 Correction for an edge case in local image repos (duplicates tags)

timeline.message: #2431 Correction for an edge case in local image repos (duplicates repo tags) crashing the image pulling

timeline.bodyText: alternatively, one can provide a 3rd argument to toMap that won't throw
timeline.author: bsideup
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -79,7 +79,11 @@ private void populateFromList(List<Image> images) {
             }
 
             cache.putAll(
-                Stream.of(repoTags).collect(Collectors.toMap(
+                Stream.of(repoTags)
+                    // Protection against some edge case where local image repository tags end up with duplicates
+                    // making toMap crash at merge time.
+                   .distinct()

replies.bodyText:
Merge function like (u, u2) -> u ?
Would do the same thing with slightly worse performance  (merge function would be applied after key and value computation), no ?
Up to you, tell me what you prefer.
replies.author: Choobz

replies.bodyText: Ok, you're right, let's keep distinct() 👍
replies.author: bsideup

timeline.bodyText: could you please fix the indentation?
timeline.author: bsideup
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -79,7 +79,11 @@ private void populateFromList(List<Image> images) {
             }
 
             cache.putAll(
-                Stream.of(repoTags).collect(Collectors.toMap(
+                Stream.of(repoTags)
+                    // Protection against some edge case where local image repository tags end up with duplicates
+                    // making toMap crash at merge time.
+                   .distinct()
+                    .collect(Collectors.toMap(
                     DockerImageName::new,
